org.nats

Class Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nats.Connection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.nats.common.NatsMonitor.Resource

    public class Connection
extends Object
implements org.nats.common.NatsMonitor.Resource
    Connection represents a bidirectional channel to NATS server. Message handler may be attached to each operation which is invoked when the operation is processed by the server. A client JVM may create multiple Connection objects by calling connect(java.util.Properties popts) multiple times.
    Author:
    Teppei Yagihashi

      • connect

        public static Connection connect(Properties popts,
                                 MsgHandler connectHandler)
                          throws IOException,
                                 InterruptedException
        Create and return a Connection with various attributes. connectHandler is invoked when connected to a server.
        Parameters:
        popts - Properties object containing connection attributes
        connectHandler - MsgHandler to be invoked when connection is established
        Returns:
        newly created Connection object
        Throws:
        IOException
        InterruptedException

      • connect

        public static Connection connect(Properties popts,
                                 MsgHandler connectHandler,
                                 MsgHandler disconnectHandler)
                          throws IOException,
                                 InterruptedException
        Create and return a Connection with various attributes. connectHandler is invoked when connected to a server and disconnectHandler is invoked when disconnected.
        Parameters:
        popts - Properties object containing connection attributes
        connectHandler - MsgHandler to be invoked when connection is established
        disconnectHandler - MsgHandler to be invoked when connection is disconnected and unable to reach any server
        Returns:
        newly created Connection object
        Throws:
        IOException
        InterruptedException
